mapper.sql: ORG_STRUCTURE_ID, PARENT_ID, TREE_NODE_CODE, SORT, CONTEXT_ID, CONTEXT_DES, LEVEL, ISLEAF, COUNT, LRNSCN_ORG_ID, STATUS, REMARK, ISVALID, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, LSTUPDID, LSTUPDDATE
mapper.insert: insert into cro_lrnscnorgstruct (ORG_STRUCTURE_ID, PARENT_ID, TREE_NODE_CODE, SORT, CONTEXT_ID, CONTEXT_DES, LEVEL, ISLEAF, COUNT, LRNSCN_ORG_ID, STATUS, REMARK, ISVALID, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, LSTUPDID, LSTUPDDATE) values (#{orgStructureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treeNodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contextId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contextDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isleaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lrnscnOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstupdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstupddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update cro_lrnscnorgstruct
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TREE_NODE_CODE = #{treeNodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTEXT_ID = #{contextId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTEXT_DES = #{contextDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ISLEAF = #{isleaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNT = #{count,jdbcType=TINYINT},
LRNSCN_ORG_ID = #{lrnscnOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISVALID = #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LSTUPDID = #{lstupdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LSTUPDDATE = #{lstupddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORG_STRUCTURE_ID = #{orgStructureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cro_lrnscnorgstruct set PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TREE_NODE_CODE = #{treeNodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTEXT_ID = #{contextId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTEXT_DES = #{contextDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ISLEAF = #{isleaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNT = #{count,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LRNSCN_ORG_ID = #{lrnscnOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISVALID = #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSTUPDID = #{lstupdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSTUPDDATE = #{lstupddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORG_STRUCTURE_ID = #{orgStructureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.PARENT_ID, a.ORG_STRUCTURE_ID, a.CONTEXT_ID, a.CONTEXT_DES, b.COUNTS, c.PROC_DEF_ID, c.TEACHER_ID, c.TEACHER_NAME, c.ORG_USER_ID, c.ORG_USER_NAME from cro_lrnscnorgstruct a, (select count(*) as COUNTS, ORG_STRUCTURE_ID from cro_lrnscnorguser where ORG_STRUCTURE_ID in (select ORG_STRUCTURE_ID from cro_lrnscnorguser where SYNID=#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LRNSCN_ORG_ID=#{lrnscnOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) group by ORG_STRUCTURE_ID ) b, (select LRNSCN_ORG_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, TEACHER_ID, TEACHER_NAME, ORG_USER_ID, ORG_USER_NAME from cro_lrnscnorg where LRNSCN_ORG_ID=#{lrnscnOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) c where a.ORG_STRUCTURE_ID = b.ORG_STRUCTURE_ID and a.LRNSCN_ORG_ID = c.LRNSCN_ORG_ID
select count(*) from cro_lrnscnorgstruct where LRNSCN_ORG_ID=#{lrnscnOrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS!="1" and SORT="O"
